recipe.title: Coconut Tapioca Porridge

preparation.li: Place tapioca and 2 cups water into a medium heavy-bottomed saucepan and let soak 30 minutes. Add coconut milk and sugar; bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to a simmer and cook about 15 minutes, or until tapioca is translucent, stirring frequently to prevent scorching. Stir in lemon juice and garnish with coconut flakes.

recipe.comment: Any anmount of sugar can be added.
